description:
Red: The hardest game in the world

So this is Red. 

This game is called Red and it is pretty much the hardest game ever. The rules are simple: Don't touch red. If at any point your cursor touches red or leaves the screen, you will lose. Stay alive to earn points. Collect blue orbs to earn points too!

Also, if you die, just refresh the page, sorry.

*~*! Any bugs found are intentional. They are definitely features, do not complain about them. !*~*

- All graphics were made in Piskellapp

- Sound FX by me using Beepbox and SFXR

- Music used: "Doom Eternal Main Theme: The Only One to Fear is You" and "Beeping Boxes"

- Coding was done by me, but feel free to use it.

Created on February 15th of 2023 because I felt like it.
